title: Future Perfect & Future Continuous
description: Master advanced future tenses to discuss completed future actions and ongoing activities at specific future times.

rules.title: Future Perfect Simple
rules.explanation: Use the future perfect to describe an action that will be completed before a specific time in the future. It emphasizes the completion of an action by a deadline.

examples.sentence: By next month, I will have visited five different countries.
examples.translation: 다음 달까지 나는 5개의 다른 나라를 방문했을 것이다.

examples.sentence: She will have learned three languages by the time she turns 25.
examples.translation: 그녀는 25살이 될 때까지 3개 국어를 배웠을 것이다.

examples.sentence: By 2030, globalization will have transformed how we work.
examples.translation: 2030년까지 세계화는 우리가 일하는 방식을 변화시켰을 것이다.

rules.title: Future Continuous
rules.explanation: Use the future continuous to describe an action that will be in progress at a specific time in the future, or to talk about planned future events.

examples.sentence: This time next week, I will be exploring ancient ruins in Greece.
examples.translation: 다음 주 이맘때쯤, 나는 그리스의 고대 유적을 탐험하고 있을 것이다.

examples.sentence: At 8 PM tomorrow, we will be flying over the Atlantic.
examples.translation: 내일 저녁 8시에 우리는 대서양 위를 비행하고 있을 것이다.

examples.sentence: They will be staying with local families during their exchange program.
examples.translation: 그들은 교환 프로그램 동안 현지 가정에 머무를 것이다.

rules.title: Future Perfect Continuous
rules.explanation: Use the future perfect continuous to emphasize the duration of an action that will have been ongoing until a point in the future.

examples.sentence: By next year, I will have been traveling for six months.
examples.translation: 내년까지, 나는 6개월 동안 여행을 해 왔을 것이다.

examples.sentence: She will have been living abroad for ten years by December.
examples.translation: 12월까지 그녀는 10년 동안 해외에 살고 있었을 것이다.

examples.sentence: By the time we arrive, they will have been waiting for three hours.
examples.translation: 우리가 도착할 때까지, 그들은 3시간 동안 기다리고 있었을 것이다.

rules.title: Future Perfect vs. Future Continuous
rules.explanation: Use future perfect when focusing on completion of an action. Use future continuous when focusing on the action being in progress at a specific moment.
rules.structure: Completion: will have + past participle / In progress: will be + -ing

examples.sentence: By 6 PM, I will have packed my bags. (completed action)
examples.translation: 오후 6시까지, 나는 짐을 다 쌀 것이다. (완료된 행동)

examples.sentence: At 6 PM, I will be packing my bags. (action in progress)
examples.translation: 오후 6시에, 나는 짐을 싸고 있을 것이다. (진행 중인 행동)

examples.sentence: When you call, I will have finished dinner. vs. When you call, I will be eating dinner.
examples.translation: 네가 전화할 때, 나는 저녁을 다 먹었을 것이다. vs. 네가 전화할 때, 나는 저녁을 먹고 있을 것이다.

rules.title: Time Expressions with Future Perfect
rules.explanation: Future perfect is commonly used with time expressions indicating a deadline or point in time: by + time/date, by the time + clause, before + time, in + time period.
rules.structure: By/Before + time reference, subject + will have + past participle

examples.sentence: By the end of this trip, we will have seen ten UNESCO heritage sites.
examples.translation: 이번 여행이 끝날 때까지, 우리는 10개의 유네스코 유산을 보게 될 것이다.

examples.sentence: Before midnight, the plane will have landed safely.
examples.translation: 자정 전에, 비행기는 안전하게 착륙했을 것이다.

examples.sentence: In two weeks, I will have completed my language course.
examples.translation: 2주 후면, 나는 어학 과정을 마쳤을 것이다.

rules.title: Future Forms for Travel Plans
rules.explanation: When discussing travel, different future forms serve different purposes: present continuous for fixed plans, going to for intentions, will for predictions, future continuous for what will be happening, future perfect for what will be completed.
rules.structure: Various future forms for different purposes

examples.sentence: We're leaving tomorrow at 6 AM. (present continuous - fixed plan)
examples.translation: 우리는 내일 오전 6시에 떠납니다. (현재진행형 - 확정된 계획)

examples.sentence: By this time tomorrow, we will be sunbathing on the beach. (future continuous)
examples.translation: 내일 이맘때면, 우리는 해변에서 일광욕을 하고 있을 것이다. (미래진행형)

examples.sentence: By the end of our vacation, we will have experienced three different cultures. (future perfect)
examples.translation: 휴가가 끝날 때까지, 우리는 세 가지 다른 문화를 경험했을 것이다. (미래완료)

exercises.question: By next summer, I _____ to ten different countries.
This time next month, we _____ (explore) ancient temples in Cambodia.
By the time we arrive at the hotel, they _____ our room ready.
At 3 PM tomorrow, the tour guide _____ (show) us the main attractions.
By December, she _____ abroad for five years.
Before the end of this year, globalization _____ (change) many traditional industries.

exercises.original: I will finish packing before midnight.
exercises.answer: By midnight, I will have finished packing.

exercises.question: What _____ this time next week? - I'll be sailing in the Caribbean!
By 2050, millions of people _____ (migrate) due to climate change.
In three hours, the flight _____ and we'll be in Paris.
